display7Scodes[] = {0x3F, 0x06, 0x5B,0x4F,0x66,0x6D}; 
{0x3F,0x06,0x5B,0x4F,0x66,0x6D,0x7D,0x07,0x7F,0x67,0x77,0x7C,0x39,0x5E,0x79,0x71};

0000 0110  1
